cleaned_text: Be a public health MVP: Get the COVID-19 vaccine to protect yourself and those around you, and then help to educate others on the clear benefits of vaccination. Vaccines are now available for Arkansans who are 5 years old or older. The available vaccines are safe, highly effective and available at locations in every county. Choose the option that best describes you: - I'm a [parent or guardian interested in getting](https://humanservices.arkansas.gov/covid-19/dhs-response-to-covid-19/mvp/arkansas-mvp-vaccines-for-children/)my child vaccinated. - I'm a [Medicaid client interested in learning more](https://humanservices.arkansas.gov/covid-19/dhs-response-to-covid-19/mvp/arkansas-mvp-client-toolkit/)about getting vaccinated at no cost. - I'm a [Provider who administers vaccines](https://humanservices.arkansas.gov/covid-19/dhs-response-to-covid-19/mvp/arkansas-mvp-provider-toolkit/)and I want to learn more about the increased Medicaid reimbursement rate. - I'm a [Friend or Family Member of someone who still needs to get vaccinated](https://humanservices.arkansas.gov/covid-19/dhs-response-to-covid-19/mvp/arkansas-mvp-talking-to-friends-and-family-about-vaccinations/)so they can be protected against COVID-19.
